heading: Advisory and support personnel
text:
The board may request the commissioner to appoint duly authorized representatives
  to conduct investigations and other activities incidental to the functions of the license board. Such appointees shall be non-voting
  members of the committee to which they are appointed, and may include personnel who are not department employees who shall
  serve without compensation. In addition the commissioner may designate such employees of the department as the commissioner
   deems necessary to the service and support of the license board.
